jobs.title: Team Lead
accomplishments: Began and organized a team of 5 or 6 people for three distinct teams using Agile Scrum or Kanban.
Reviewed, assessed, and interviewed many new employee candidates resulting in the majority of the sitting staff today.
Organized project to decommission and replace a major component of the CI/CD pipeline while keeping deployments uninterrupted.
Organized and contributed to multiple feature sets related to rates, billing, scheduling, job matching, and many other core business related features.
Organized and contributed to swapping database access layer tools across 13 micro-services.
Created, maintained, and provided training for managing multiple NuGet repositories.

Participated in design and implementation solutions related to messaging, data access, performance, data structure, code quality, test coverage, continuous delivery, and many more solutions specific to the business requirements.

jobs.title: Software Developer
accomplishments: Developed an Android and an iOS application using C#, Xamarin, and Xcode.
Developed web applications with JavaScript and AngularJS.
Developed service applications with C#, dotNet Core, ServiceStack, RabbitMq, and AWS technologies (EC2, DynamoDB, RDS, SQS, SNS, etc..).
Developed database applications with BSON (MongoDB), T-SQL (Microsoft SQL Server or Postgres), or JSON-B (Postgres).
Fixed defects in legacy web based applications using ASP.NET, C#, JavaScript/JQuery, and MS SQL.
Provided Tier III support for issues found in the field that required immediate patches or data changes in production.
Maintained and developed automated UI and web service tests using FluentAssertions, Nunit, Selenium, and C#.
Published documentation on development standards, practices, and patterns.
Represented ShiftWise software development at social events.

jobs.title: QA Analyst II
accomplishments: Created, managed, and delegated test plans for multiple supported versions of a third-party telephony client/server application integrated with locally developed SaS web/application/database application suite.
Setup and tested with Cisco and BroadSoft call management applications and phone systems.

Collaborated with agile sprint teams in the US and Britain including multiple daily scrum meetings, sprint planning, reviews and retrospectives using TFS, Visual Studio 2012, Live Meeting and OneNote.
Created and maintained 10 to 20 virtual machines and/or templates for QA, Integration, and Staging environments using vSphere.
Created custom test case and bug tracking reports for sprint reviews and upon request of Product Owners/Product Managers.

jobs.title: Sr. QA Engineer/Lead
accomplishments: Designed and developed automated test suites using C#, MSTest and Selenium for stored value/gift card processing services and websites.
Managed User Stories, Tasks, Test Cases, Test Suites using TFS (Team Foundation Server) and Microsoft Test Manager.
Provided professional consultation for all quality analysis management, planning and effort.
Submitted, researched, and validated Bug work items in TFS.
Maintained multiple test environments (both client and server environments) using VMWare.
Executed minimal acceptance test suites against staging and production (nightly) deployments on a weekly basis.
Perform Globalization, PCI, and multi-browser testing.

jobs.title: QA Analyst
accomplishments: Designed and developed automated test suites using C#, NUnit and WatiN for online banking applications.
Setup Continuous Integration using CrusieControl.NET and PowerShell for automatically triggering product installation and test execution against multiple virtual-server environments.
Developed and maintained a Quality Center API application in C# using XSLT that allows NUnit tests to be automatically uploaded into Quality Center.
Core automation team member involved in setting standards and processes for my department’s automation development.
Regularly tested and maintain multi-server environments running online banking software.
Worked with architects and senior engineers to research, develop and automate tests for a new SOA based product.
Provided expertise and guidance to develop internal Knowledge Base.
Traveled to India to train geographically diverse QA and development teams.

jobs.title: Software Test Engineer
accomplishments: Constructed test plans and test cases from a variety of sources to provide an efficient amount of testing over a numerous-product, client-to-server scope (System Testing). This included, but was not limited to company fees, bank loan programs, client software and multi-office managing suites.
Focus of testing on the 30+ server Filing Center that included SQL 2005, JBoss, Tomcat, IIS, BigIP, and basic application servers running Win2k3 Server.
Solely provide compliance testing and test procedures for largest banking partner- the company’s largest single source of income providing ~80% of the bank services.
Identify and relay software defects to development, product management, and external partners. Verify and release hot-fixes to production during live operation.

jobs.title: Support Analyst/Tester
accomplishments: Designed and implemented two versions of a fully integrated web-based CRM system in cooperation with a team of four.
Produced professional level software requirements and specifications for multiple internal products including the CRM System and Knowledge Base.
Managed a team of four to develop and maintain a knowledge base that was 1200+ articles for both internal and public viewing.
